channel.title: Homes on Zheng Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Zheng Wang

item.description: My research agenda is to make software development easier and more accessible so that every programmer can easily write, maintain and optimise software. I maintain a list of must-read research papers for machine learning in compilers. My research interests include: Program optimisation and analysis: I am interested in how we can design new algorithms and optimisation techniques at compilers and operating systems to improve application performance and energy efficiency; I often use machine learning (including deep learning) as a design methodology.

item.title: News
item.description: [September, 2023] New 24-month Innovative UK project awarded (PI) - An RA post will open soon. [May, 2023] New EPSRC-funded project (PI) on buidling secure and high-performance memory allocators [July, 2022] Awarded a project (PI) on transformative compiler technology [Jun, 2022] Two papers accepted by SC 2022 (CCF Rank-A conference) [Oct, 2021] Received Facebook gift award for research on GPU optimisation. [July, 2021] We are hiring a research fellow in compiler optimisaiton!

item.title: Research Team
item.description: PDRAs Chunwei Xia Xiaoyang Sun PhD Students Jiayu Zhao, 10 / 2020 - (Funded by Industrial PhD Scholarship); Shenghao Qiu, 10 / 2020 - (Funded by industry PhD studentship); Yin Wu, 01 / 2021 -, Funded by Leeds-SUSTech Joint PhD program (co-supervised with James Jianqiao Yu from SUSTech); Yachao Zhu, 04 / 2021 - (Funded by School of Computing Scholarship); Patrick Lenihan, 10 / 2021 - (Funded by School of Computing DTP Scholarship); Huanting Wang, 10 / 2021 - (Funded by School of Computing Scholarship); Beite Yang, 10 / 2021 - (co-supervised with Amirul Khan and Peter Jimack, funded by CFD CDT); Yiming Ma, 09 / 2023 - (Funded by industry PhD scholarship); Hua Wei Zhang, 10 / 2023 - (Funded by EPSRC DTP scholarship); Ce Yang, 10 / 2023 - Visitors Yiming Wang, 12 / 2023 - 06 / 2024 visiting PhD Student Alumni Xiaoyang Sun 10 / 2019 - 11 / 2023 - now Research Fellow at University of Leeds Rodrigo Caetano Rocha 10 / 2016 - 07 / 2021 - now Senior Researcher at Huawei Edinburgh Lab Ben Taylor (PhD Student) - firt job: Transport for the North Vicent Sanz Marco (PDRA) - Assistant professor at Osaka University, Japan Volker Seeker (PDRA) - now with Meta AI Guixin Ye - now associate professor at Northwest University; Best paper award nomination at CCS 2018, ACM China Best PhD Dissertation Award (Shaanxi Province).

item.title: Biography
item.description: July 2019 - , Professor (Associate Professor prior 2022) School of Computing, University of Leeds September 2013 - July 2019, Senior Lecturer (Lecturer prior 2017), School of Computing and Communications, Lancaster University. 2012 - 2013, Research Associate, the University of Edinbugh. 2007 - 2011, PhD Student, the University of Edinburgh. Nominated for BCS Distinguished Dissertation Award; 2005 - 2007, Research Staff member, IBM China Research Lab
